devdoc.author: BetNad
devdoc.details: Factory contract for creating and managing betting markets

claimAllRewards(address).details: Claim all pending rewards for a user across all markets

returns.totalClaimed: Total amount claimed across all markets

params.question: The question for the betting market

returns._0: The address of the created market
The balance of the factory contract

params.index: The index of the market in the markets array

returns.isActive: Whether the market is active (not settled)
returns.question: The question of the market

getUserBetHistory(address).details: Get user's bet history across all markets

returns.marketAddresses: Array of market addresses where user has bets
returns.noAmounts: Array of amounts bet on no for each market
returns.totalAmounts: Array of total amounts bet for each market
returns.yesAmounts: Array of amounts bet on yes for each market

getUserMarkets(address).details: Get all markets created by a specific user

returns._0: Array of market addresses created by the user

getUserPendingClaims(address).details: Get user's pending claims across all markets

returns.claimAmounts: Array of claimable amounts for each market
returns.marketAddresses: Array of market addresses where user has pending claims

removeMarket(address).details: Emergency function to remove a market (only owner)

params.marketAddress: The address of the market to remove

devdoc.title: BetFactory
